'''Lloyd Michael Sherr''' (born [[1956]]) is an American voice actor.
==Roles==
* [[2009]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Conquest]]'': [[Saruman]]
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'': [[Hwaldar]]
